title: Anthropic acquires Bun as Claude Code reaches $1B revenue milestone
description: Anthropic has acquired Bun, the JavaScript runtime company, to accelerate Claude Code and other AI development tools. This marks Anthropic's first acquisition and comes as Claude Code reached $1 billion in revenue just 6 months after public launch.

community_feedback.quote: This will 10x the adoption of Claude Code among JS developers
Strategic move to integrate Bun's JavaScript runtime capabilities directly into Claude's AI development ecosystem

title: Copilot Spaces: Public spaces and code view support
description: GitHub released three major updates to Copilot Spaces: public spaces for team collaboration, individual sharing capabilities, and the ability to add files to a space directly from the github.com code viewer. These updates enhance context sharing and team collaboration features.

community_feedback.quote: I didn't see how this github copilot space is valuable
Active discussions about Copilot effectiveness for large projects

title: Gemini CLI v0.15.0 with Seamless Scrollable UI & Mouse Support
description: Google released Gemini CLI v0.15.0 featuring a major facelift with seamless scrollable UI and mouse support, significantly improving the terminal user experience and making the interface more intuitive and accessible.
